name: Spiritomb
author: Ryo Ueda
flavor_text: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

poke_power.name: Curse Breath
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Spiritomb from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on all Pokémon that already have any damage counters on them (both yours and your opponent’s). You can’t use more than 1 Curse Breath Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Transfer Pain
attacks.effect: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.
